original_text: One person has good health all his life. Even when he is ready to die, he still lives a safe and happy life. One person has good health all his life. Even when he is ready to die, he still lives a safe and happy life. One person has good health all his life. Even when he is ready to die, he still lives a safe and happy life. One person has good health all his life.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 죽도록 기운이 충실하여 안전하며 평안하고

sentences.original_text: One person has good health all his life
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람은 평생 좋은 건강을 가집니다

sentences.original_text: Even when he is ready to die
he still lives a safe and happy life
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여전히 안전하고 행복한 삶을 삽니다
